column3: ACK. Does not break gitian build.\n
Diapolo, i had to add `-loleaut32` as per https://github.com/Diapolo/bitcoin/commit/510f7fceb677ce1af3096f5c2b54f3832e5efee2 but i also shifted it around with the other deps\n
@Diapolo Could you shed some light on whether 0.4.x - 0.6.x need this as well? Thanks\n

I really can't comment for < 0.6 as I never compiled any versions below that for myself, but I remember that some Boost version update made me use a similar project-file. Dunno remember more details, sorry.\n
